content: The Spirit of Captain Kalpa-Wave is one of the later-area Key Items in The New West in Black Myth: Wukong. It has an effect on unlocking one of the more powerful Weapons in the game.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Spirit_of_Captain_Kalpa-Wave.md', within the main section titled 'The Spirit of Captain Kalpa-Wave'.
The content is as follows:
The Spirit of Captain Kalpa-Wave is one of the later-area Key Items in The New West in Black Myth: Wukong. It has an effect on unlocking one of the more powerful Weapons in the game.
